testcase.title: 001)Check Chinese locale is displayed on Alerts Page for localization

substeps.message: New Home page logged in  properly and Locale Icon is Displayed

steps.title: the "HomePage" page should be loaded on log on with Locale Dropdown
I verify "Chinese" language should listed under the Locale Dropdown and Select check-box against Chinese

substeps.message: Index Search Linked Clicked User clicked on the Index Search Link

steps.title: I perform Quick Search by term "cancer"
I click on ClinicalTrials dataset in the result page

substeps.message: Report link is clicked.

steps.title: I click on "random" report link from the results table
I click on the alerts link

substeps.message: Alert pageLoaded Properly With Chinese Text

steps.title: I Verify Ch lang on "Alerts" page

substeps.message: On 'Alerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'qsearch.report.alert.create' with the key 'qsearch.report.alert.create' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI CREATE are NOT matching

On 'Alerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'cpgsavereportview.save_search_query' with the key 'cpgsavereportview.save_search_query' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????? and the Content displayed on UI Save Search Query are NOT matching

On 'Alerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'cpgsavereportview.alert_on_search_query' with the key 'cpgsavereportview.alert_on_search_query' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ????? and the Content displayed on UI Alert on Search Query are NOT matching

On 'Alerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'qsearch.report.choose_alert_update' with the key 'qsearch.report.choose_alert_update' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ???????????????????????????? and the Content displayed on UI Choose if you would like to create an alert or update existing alert(s) to additionally include this report. are NOT matching

On 'Alerts' Chinese localization verification ***FAILED*** for 'modalquickfix.cancel' with the key 'modalquickfix.cancel' in properties file. Reason for failure: content From Properties File ?? and the Content displayed on UI Cancel are NOT matching
